name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Security Engineer with over 9 years of experience in developing secure applications and implementing robust security protocols. Extensive knowledge of ISO 27001, ISO 27002, and assessment frameworks including SOC and PCI, ensuring compliance and risk management. Excellent technical documentation skills and strong English communication abilities, coupled with a proven track record of delivering secure and efficient solutions in collaboration with cross-functional teams.
